name: nuxt-ssg
description: Nuxt module for SSG-optimized data fetching with automatic tree-shaking

scripts.dev:prepare: nuxt-module-build build --stub && nuxt-module-build prepare && nuxi prepare playground && pnpm prepare:fixtures
scripts.prepare:fixtures: cd test/fixtures/ssg && nuxi prepare && cd ../ssr && nuxi prepare && cd ../csr && nuxi prepare && cd ../hybrid && nuxi prepare
scripts.test:types: vue-tsc --noEmit && cd playground && vue-tsc --noEmit && cd .. && pnpm test:types:e2e
scripts.test:types:e2e: cd test/fixtures/ssg && vue-tsc --noEmit && cd ../ssr && vue-tsc --noEmit && cd ../csr && vue-tsc --noEmit && cd ../hybrid && vue-tsc --noEmit
